response.original_title: Country's Family Reunion: Old Time Gospel Volume One
response.overview: Featuring everything from Old-Time Gospel to Honky Tonk and Bluegrass, the beloved performance show Countryâ€™s Family Reunion started all the way back in 1996, when Larry David established Gabriel Communication to launch a series of Reunion videos.  Country music legends gathered in an informal setting to sing nostalgic songs, share their stories, and provide a fascinating behind-the-scenes glimpse into their histories.  The reunions soon became a favorite cable television show that ran for over two decades. In all, the show featured the greatest classics of country music, with over 400 artists!  Producer//Director  James Burton Yockey  73 min  Released 2011  Guest stars:  Rhonda Vincent  Dallas Frazier  Ed Bruce  Con Hunley  Jan Howard  Gary Morris
response.title: Country's Family Reunion: Old Time Gospel Volume One
